data.问题: 李华接到助手小张的消息后，会选择做什么？

data.选项B: B.回复编辑，他需要更多时间来完成拍摄。
data.选项C: C.请求小张帮忙爬到高处拍照。
data.选项D: D.继续当前的拍摄。
data.STORY: Li Hua is a photographer, he is taking cover photos for a magazine. At this time, his assistant Xiao Zhang runs to tell him that his favorite photography exhibition is about to start. At the same time, the editor of the magazine calls to urge him to complete the shooting work as soon as possible.
data.QUESTION: What does Li Hua choose to do after receiving the message from assistant Xiao Zhang?
data.OPTION-A: He goes to watch the photography exhibition immediately.
data.OPTION-B: He replies to the editor that he needs more time to complete the shooting.
data.OPTION-C: He asks Xiao Zhang to help climb to a high place to take pictures.
data.OPTION-D: He continues the current shooting.

data.OPTION-B: She continues to stay at home and read.

data.OPTION-D: She reviews the questions she gets wrong before.

data.问题: 小红发现电视坏了之后，她最有可能会做什么？
data.选项A: A. 继续尝试修理电视。
data.选项B: B. 邀请小刚一起去电器店看新电视。
data.选项C: C. 出去散步放松心情。
data.选项D: D. 在网上搜索如何修理电视的方法。
data.STORY: Xiao Hong just comes home and she finds that the TV at home does not work. She checks the TV plug and finds everything is normal, but the TV still cannot turn on. At this time, her roommate Xiao Gang comes home and tells her that he goes to an appliance store today and sees a new type of smart TV, and he really wants to buy it. Xiao Hong knows that Xiao Gang is saving money recently, but she also really wants a new TV. She looks out the window and finds that the weather is very good, which is suitable for going out for a walk to think.
data.QUESTION: After Xiao Hong finds out that the TV is broken, what does she most likely do?
data.OPTION-A: She continues to try to repair the TV.
data.OPTION-B: She invites Xiao Gang to go to the appliance store to see the new TV.
data.OPTION-C: She goes out for a walk to relax.
data.OPTION-D: She searches online for how to repair the TV.

data.故事: 李华是一位热爱绘画的中学生，有一天放学后，他决定去公园绘制风景画。当他找到一个理想的画景点时，突然发现画板上的颜料不足。这时，他的朋友小王打来电话，询问他是否要一起去书店。李华在电话中听到书店附近的艺术用品店正在打折。就在这时，李华的妈妈发来信息，提醒他今天晚上有一个重要的数学考试。
data.问题: 李华挂断电话后，他会选择做什么？
data.选项A: A. 继续在公园画画，即使颜料不足。
data.选项B: B. 去书店和小王会面。
data.选项C: C. 回家准备数学考试。
data.选项D: D. 去艺术用品店购买颜料。
data.STORY: Li Hua is a middle school student who loves painting. One day after school, he decides to go to the park to paint a landscape. When he finds an ideal painting spot, he suddenly realizes that there is not enough paint on the palette. At this time, his friend Xiao Wang calls him, asking if he wants to go to the bookstore together. Li Hua hears from the phone that the art supply store near the bookstore is having a sale. Just at this moment, Li Hua's mother sends a message, reminding him that there is an important math exam tonight.
data.QUESTION: What does Li Hua choose to do after he hangs up the phone?
data.OPTION-A: He continues to paint in the park, even if the paint is not enough.
data.OPTION-B: He goes to the bookstore to meet Xiao Wang.
data.OPTION-C: He goes home to prepare for the math exam.
data.OPTION-D: He goes to the art supply store to buy paint.

data.问题: 张伟帮助李华解决数学问题后，他接下来会做什么？

data.STORY: Zhang Wei is a diligent college student, he is studying in the library for the upcoming exam. Suddenly, he receives an urgent call from his good friend Li Hua, Li Hua needs help solving a difficult math problem. Zhang Wei is happy to help, but he also realizes that time is pressing, the exam is less than two days away. While he is helping Li Hua, his other friend Wang Fang sends a message, inviting him to a birthday party tonight. Zhang Wei knows this party is important to Wang Fang, but he also knows he needs to study.
data.QUESTION: After Zhang Wei helps Li Hua solve the math problem, what does he do next?
data.OPTION-A: He continues to study for the exam in the library.
data.OPTION-B: He goes home to rest because he feels very tired.
data.OPTION-C: He goes to Wang Fang's birthday party.
data.OPTION-D: He calls another friend to discuss whether to go to the party or not.

data.STORY: On a cold winter night, Xiao Li is reading a book about plant encyclopedia at home. data.问题: 李华看完信息后，他会怎么做？
data.选项A: A. 离开图书馆去帮助王刚解决数学问题。
data.选项B: B. 向老师求助，一起解决王刚的数学问题。
data.选项C: C. 请求老师允许他在图书馆多待一会儿，以便帮助王刚。
data.选项D: D. 忽略王刚的信息，专注于阅读。

At the same time, his teacher happens to come over, reminding him that the library is about to close, and asking him if he needs extra materials to help study.
data.QUESTION: After Li Hua reads the message, what does he do?
data.OPTION-A: He leaves the library to help Wang Gang solve the math problem.
data.OPTION-B: He asks the teacher for help to solve Wang Gang's math problem together.
data.OPTION-C: He asks the teacher to allow him to stay in the library a little longer to help Wang Gang.
data.OPTION-D: He ignores Wang Gang's message and focuses on reading.
